name: Landfill (Clebin Games)
description:
Landfill is a fast-moving arcade puzzler for all Commodore Amigas with 1mb of memory.

Match items of landfill as they fall - televisions with remotes, remotes with armchairs... cameras, with photographs, with cheese, with milk.. As the game progresses, new items are added. Just try to remember what matches with what!

86%, Retro Gamer magazine, Issue 199, October 2019:

"That constant expansion is a clever twist on the standard [Tetris] formula and Landfill therefore changes as it progresses, so, while it might initially seem to be a simple pattern matching game, having to remember which objects can be paired up turns it into a combination of action puzzle and memory test."

Swapping

Use fire button + direction to swap with the item next to you. This will let you create chain reactions and rack up extra points.

A version for iPhone and iPad is also available on the Apple App Store.
